name: All Dark Eyes Wide Open version 3
description:
Modified All Dark military by airstep to be used with Black Youtube by Panos http://userstyles.org/styles/62289/black-youtube-by-panos and Black Google by Panos http://userstyles.org/styles/61377/black-google-by-panos
About version 3
Fix for swf (shock wave flash video) because some sites the video would constantly pause and if i pressed play it would start from the beginning again.
